original_title: Um Uísque Antes... e Um Cigarro Depois
overview: A compilation of three stories charged with sexual tension: A man taking revenge on a friend who got involved with his cheating wife, a woman being abandoned by her boyfriend and couple taking things in bed a bit too far.
tagline: And between the whiskey and the cigarette...?
title: Um Uísque Antes... e Um Cigarro Depois
